trans-unit.source: How to Make a phone call from Twilio (Java) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Make a phone call from Twilio (Java) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call from a web page using Twilio in a Java application on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call from a web page using Twilio in a Java application on Azure.

trans-unit.source: How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a Java Application on Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a Java Application on Azure

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a web page hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a web page hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.
trans-unit.target: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.

trans-unit.source: Azure Call Form Using Twilio and Java
trans-unit.target: Azure Call Form Using Twilio and Java

trans-unit.source: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:
trans-unit.target: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:

trans-unit.source: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].
trans-unit.target: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].

trans-unit.source: You can sign up at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].
trans-unit.target: You can sign up at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].

trans-unit.source: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/api][twilio_api].
trans-unit.target: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/api][twilio_api].

trans-unit.source: Obtain the Twilio JAR.
trans-unit.target: Obtain the Twilio JAR.

trans-unit.source: At [https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java][twilio_java_github], you can download the GitHub sources and create your own JAR, or download a pre-built JAR (with or without dependencies).
trans-unit.target: At [https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java][twilio_java_github], you can download the GitHub sources and create your own JAR, or download a pre-built JAR (with or without dependencies).

trans-unit.source: The code in this topic was written using the pre-built TwilioJava-3.3.8-with-dependencies JAR.
trans-unit.target: The code in this topic was written using the pre-built TwilioJava-3.3.8-with-dependencies JAR.

trans-unit.source: Add the JAR to your Java build path.
trans-unit.target: Add the JAR to your Java build path.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Eclipse to create this Java application, include the Twilio JAR in your application deployment file (WAR) using Eclipse's deployment assembly feature.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Eclipse to create this Java application, include the Twilio JAR in your application deployment file (WAR) using Eclipse's deployment assembly feature.

trans-unit.source: If you are not using Eclipse to create this Java application, ensure the Twilio JAR is included within the same Azure role as your Java application, and added to the class path of your application.
trans-unit.target: If you are not using Eclipse to create this Java application, ensure the Twilio JAR is included within the same Azure role as your Java application, and added to the class path of your application.

trans-unit.source: Ensure your cacerts keystore contains the Equifax Secure Certificate Authority certificate with MD5 fingerprint 67:CB:9D:C0:13:24:8A:82:9B:B2:17:1E:D1:1B:EC:D4 (the serial number is 35:DE:F4:CF and the SHA1 fingerprint is D2:32:09:AD:23:D3:14:23:21:74:E4:0D:7F:9D:62:13:97:86:63:3A).
trans-unit.target: Ensure your cacerts keystore contains the Equifax Secure Certificate Authority certificate with MD5 fingerprint 67:CB:9D:C0:13:24:8A:82:9B:B2:17:1E:D1:1B:EC:D4 (the serial number is 35:DE:F4:CF and the SHA1 fingerprint is D2:32:09:AD:23:D3:14:23:21:74:E4:0D:7F:9D:62:13:97:86:63:3A).

trans-unit.source: This is the certificate authority (CA) certificate for the [https://api.twilio.com][twilio_api_service] service, which is called when you use Twilio APIs.
trans-unit.target: This is the certificate authority (CA) certificate for the [https://api.twilio.com][twilio_api_service] service, which is called when you use Twilio APIs.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding this CA certificate to your JDK's cacert store, see [Adding a Certificate to the Java CA Certificate Store][add_ca_cert].
trans-unit.target: For information about adding this CA certificate to your JDK's cacert store, see [Adding a Certificate to the Java CA Certificate Store][add_ca_cert].

trans-unit.source: Additionally, familiarity with the information at [Creating a Hello World Application Using the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)][azure_java_eclipse_hello_world], or with other techniques for hosting Java applications in Azure if you are not using Eclipse, is highly recommended.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, familiarity with the information at [Creating a Hello World Application Using the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)][azure_java_eclipse_hello_world], or with other techniques for hosting Java applications in Azure if you are not using Eclipse, is highly recommended.

trans-unit.source: Create a web form for making a call
trans-unit.target: Create a web form for making a call

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a web form to retrieve user data for making a call.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to create a web form to retrieve user data for making a call.

trans-unit.source: For purposes of this example, a new dynamic web project, named **TwilioCloud**, was created, and **callform.jsp** was added as a JSP file.
trans-unit.target: For purposes of this example, a new dynamic web project, named **TwilioCloud**, was created, and **callform.jsp** was added as a JSP file.

trans-unit.source: Create the code to make the call
trans-unit.target: Create the code to make the call

trans-unit.source: The following code, which is called when the user completes the form displayed by callform.jsp, creates the call message and generates the call.
trans-unit.target: The following code, which is called when the user completes the form displayed by callform.jsp, creates the call message and generates the call.

trans-unit.source: For purposes of this example, the JSP file is named **makecall.jsp** and was added to the **TwilioCloud** project.
trans-unit.target: For purposes of this example, the JSP file is named **makecall.jsp** and was added to the **TwilioCloud** project.

trans-unit.source: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **accountSID** and **authToken** in the code below.)
trans-unit.target: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **accountSID** and **authToken** in the code below.)

trans-unit.source: In addition to making the call, makecall.jsp displays the Twilio endpoint, API version, and the call status.
trans-unit.target: In addition to making the call, makecall.jsp displays the Twilio endpoint, API version, and the call status.

trans-unit.source: An example is the following screen shot:
trans-unit.target: An example is the following screen shot:

trans-unit.source: Azure Call Response Using Twilio and Java
trans-unit.target: Azure Call Response Using Twilio and Java

trans-unit.source: Run the application
trans-unit.target: Run the application

trans-unit.source: Following are the high-level steps to run your application; details for these steps can be found at [Creating a Hello World Application Using the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)][azure_java_eclipse_hello_world].
trans-unit.target: Following are the high-level steps to run your application; details for these steps can be found at [Creating a Hello World Application Using the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)][azure_java_eclipse_hello_world].

trans-unit.source: Export your TwilioCloud WAR to the Azure **approot** folder.
trans-unit.target: Export your TwilioCloud WAR to the Azure **approot** folder.

trans-unit.source: Modify **startup.cmd** to unzip your TwilioCloud WAR.
trans-unit.target: Modify **startup.cmd** to unzip your TwilioCloud WAR.

trans-unit.source: Compile your application for the compute emulator.
trans-unit.target: Compile your application for the compute emulator.

trans-unit.source: Start your deployment in the compute emulator.
trans-unit.target: Start your deployment in the compute emulator.

trans-unit.source: Open a browser, and run **http://localhost:8080/TwilioCloud/callform.jsp**.
trans-unit.target: Open a browser, and run **http://localhost:8080/TwilioCloud/callform.jsp**.

trans-unit.source: Enter values in the form, click **Make this call**, and then see the results in makecall.jsp.
trans-unit.target: Enter values in the form, click **Make this call**, and then see the results in makecall.jsp.

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to deploy to Azure, recompile for deployment to the cloud, deploy to Azure, and run http://*your_hosted_name*.cloudapp.net/TwilioCloud/callform.jsp in the browser (substitute your value for *your_hosted_name*).
trans-unit.target: When you are ready to deploy to Azure, recompile for deployment to the cloud, deploy to Azure, and run http://*your_hosted_name*.cloudapp.net/TwilioCloud/callform.jsp in the browser (substitute your value for *your_hosted_name*).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in Java on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in Java on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.
trans-unit.target: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.

trans-unit.source: For information about using Azure storage blobs in Java, see [How to Use the Blob Storage Service from Java][howto_blob_storage_java].
trans-unit.target: For information about using Azure storage blobs in Java, see [How to Use the Blob Storage Service from Java][howto_blob_storage_java].

trans-unit.source: For information about using SQL Database in Java, see [Using SQL Database in Java][howto_sql_azure_java].
trans-unit.target: For information about using SQL Database in Java, see [Using SQL Database in Java][howto_sql_azure_java].

trans-unit.source: You could use **RoleEnvironment.getConfigurationSettings** to retrieve the Twilio account ID and authentication token from your deployment's configuration settings, instead of hard-coding the values in makecall.jsp.
trans-unit.target: You could use **RoleEnvironment.getConfigurationSettings** to retrieve the Twilio account ID and authentication token from your deployment's configuration settings, instead of hard-coding the values in makecall.jsp.

trans-unit.source: For information about the **RoleEnvironment** class, see [Using the Azure Service Runtime Library in JSP][azure_runtime_jsp] and the Azure Service Runtime package documentation at [http://dl.windowsazure.com/javadoc][azure_javadoc].
trans-unit.target: For information about the **RoleEnvironment** class, see [Using the Azure Service Runtime Library in JSP][azure_runtime_jsp] and the Azure Service Runtime package documentation at [http://dl.windowsazure.com/javadoc][azure_javadoc].

trans-unit.source: The makecall.jsp code assigns a Twilio-provided URL, [http://twimlets.com/message][twimlet_message_url], to the **Url** variable.
trans-unit.target: The makecall.jsp code assigns a Twilio-provided URL, [http://twimlets.com/message][twimlet_message_url], to the **Url** variable.

trans-unit.source: This URL provides a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call.
trans-unit.target: This URL provides a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call.

trans-unit.source: For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a **<Say>** verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient.
trans-unit.target: For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a **<Say>** verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see [How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in Java][howto_twilio_voice_sms_java].
trans-unit.target: Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see [How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in Java][howto_twilio_voice_sms_java].

trans-unit.source: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml], and more information about **<Say>** and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].
trans-unit.target: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml], and more information about **<Say>** and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].

trans-unit.source: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].
trans-unit.target: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].

trans-unit.source: For additional information about Twilio, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
trans-unit.target: For additional information about Twilio, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
